description: This file defines the NotesViewModel class for managing notes data within an Android MVVM architecture, including search functionality, data retrieval, and modification methods.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel class for handling notes data, including search queries, database operations, and data exposure for UI components.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Updates the current search query used to filter notes.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a note in the database asynchronously.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database asynchronously.
